DOC.criteria: Subject normal eye use ocular medication Subject 1.00 10.00 D myopia , less 2.00 D astigmatism VA correctable Log MAR 0.1 better . Willing comply study procedure available duration study . Provide sign date informed consent form . Subjects history allergy would contraindicate `` normal '' contact lens wear . Subjects active ocular systemic disease , limited : anterior uveitis ( past present ) , glaucoma , Sj√∂gren 's syndrome , lupus erythematosus , scleroderma , keratoconus type II diabetes . Subjects medication would contraindicate contact lens wear . Currently pregnant ( best subject 's knowledge ) , lactate planning pregnancy within next 3 month . Current drug alcohol use dependence , opinion site investigator , would interfere adherence study requirement . Any active participation another clinical trial within 30 day prior study . The presence clinically significant ( grade 3 4 ) anterior segment abnormality ; inflammation iritis ; infection eye , lid , associate structure . A known history corneal hypoesthesia ( reduced corneal sensitivity ) , corneal ulcer , corneal infiltrates fungal infection . A history papillary conjunctivitis interfere contact lens wear .
